entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY AND MUCH COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 17
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
